EmailTemplate.subject: test
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://aerospace.honeywell.com/services> <https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace>
Honeywell wants you to see for yourself. We’re glad to hear from you! Thanks for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. We’ve already started working on your {!Case.Subject} inquiry. Here’s your unique tracking number: {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}. You can use this number to track our progress. We’ll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, please leave the subject line unchanged, should you reply, to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com <http://www.myaerospace.com/> 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099 ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
